scripts.start: ( [ -f ./src/statics/favicon.ico ] || aws s3 cp s3://simonegazza.me/resources/ ./src/statics ) && react-scripts start
scripts.build: cp ./src/statics/favicon.ico ./src/public/ && aws s3 sync ./src/statics s3://simonegazza.me/resources && react-scripts build
scripts.deploy: aws s3 sync ./src/statics s3://simonegazza.me/resources && aws s3 sync build/ s3://simonegazza.me
